meanings.definition: To come together in a group or gathering.
meanings.sent1: The birds foregathers in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: The students foregathers in the library for their study group.
meanings.sent3: The toys foregathers in the toy chest after playtime.
meanings.sent4: The stars foregathers in the night sky, creating a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The ants foregathers around the sugar cube, working together to carry it to their nest.

meanings.definition: To assemble or meet in one place.
meanings.sent1: The family foregathers at the dinner table every evening.
meanings.sent2: The team foregathers in the locker room before the big game.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients foregathers on the kitchen counter, ready to be cooked.
meanings.sent4: The clouds foregathers in the sky, signaling an upcoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The books foregathers on the shelf, neatly arranged by genre.
